Changelog
=========

This page provides access to the complete changelog and release history for openseries.

GitHub Releases
---------------

The complete changelog with detailed release information is maintained on GitHub. This includes:

- **Latest releases** with detailed change logs
- **Breaking changes** and migration guides
- **Bug fixes** and performance improvements
- **New features** and enhancements
- **Dependency updates** and compatibility notes

**View the complete changelog**: `GitHub Releases <https://github.com/CaptorAB/openseries/releases>`_

Current Release Information
---------------------------

**Latest Version**: `2.0.0 <https://github.com/CaptorAB/openseries/releases/tag/2.0.0>`_

Key highlights from recent releases:

- **Version 2.0.0**: Adjustments to ensure alignments with new readthedocs.io documentation and new weight strategies in OpenFrame.make_portfolio()
- **Version 1.9.7**: Improved use of common logic helper functions, portfolio simulation optimization, and enhanced type annotations
- **Version 1.9.6**: Updates to adhere to ruff 0.13.0, mypy standards, and added plot title options

For complete details on all changes, please visit the `GitHub Releases page <https://github.com/CaptorAB/openseries/releases>`_.

Changelog Format
----------------

The changelog follows the `Keep a Changelog <https://keepachangelog.com/>`_ format and openseries adheres to `Semantic Versioning <https://semver.org/>`_.

**Categories**

- **Added**: New features
- **Changed**: Changes in existing functionality
- **Deprecated**: Soon-to-be removed features
- **Removed**: Now removed features
- **Fixed**: Bug fixes
- **Security**: Vulnerability fixes
